name: Pyle Portable Megaphone Bullhorn - Bluetooth Compatible PA Speaker with Built-in Voice Changer, 1500 Yard Range, Siren, 100W Adjustable Vol Control, Loudspeaker for Outdoor Sports & Safety Drills
short_description: LOUD, CLEAR SOUND COVERAGE - Ensure your message is heard loud and clear with this 100-watt megaphone that projects sound up to 1500 square yards - the size of 12 football fields! Ideal for large gatherings, outdoor events, and crowd control.

VERSATILE AUDIO MODES - Switch between Talk, Siren, Music, and Whistle modes to suit any situation. This bullhorn adapts instantly, whether you’re broadcasting, playing music, or sounding an alarm, keeping you prepared for any event or emergency.

FUN VOICE CHANGER FEATURE - Keep the crowd entertained with six fun voice modes, from Monster to Alien! Great for events, pep rallies, or simply adding fun to your announcements, this mini megaphone makes every message unforgettable.

LIGHTWEIGHT, EASY TO HANDLE - Designed with a comfortable pistol grip and lightweight ABS chassis, this bullhorn megaphone is easy to carry for extended periods. It’s perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, providing flexibility and reliable sound control.

BLUETOOTH & AUX CONNECTIVITY - Easily connect your devices for seamless audio streaming via Bluetooth or 3.5mm AUX. Play music or other audio files directly from your smartphone, making this megaphone rechargeable ideal for any gathering.

product_description: The KTMPH75UBLBAT is a high-powered megaphone great for any occasion. For convenience, it features a wired microphone that can be attached to the back of the KTMPH75UBLBAT and activated via the trigger controls or detached and activated via integrated controls on the microphone itself. The KTMPH75UBLBAT also comes with a built-in siren and internal memory that allows you to record messages and play them on a loop. All of this is backed up by the MPH75U’s high peak power output of 75 watts which helps cover larger areas. In addition to its microphone, the KTMPH75UBLBAT also sports USB, SD, and AUX inputs that allow you to play recorded messages and even music from smartphones, music storage devices, and more. For extended playback time, the KTMPH75UBLBAT operates on 8 C batteries or the rechargeable Battery that gives you hours of use.
